body:
#### PR description:

<!-- 
The present proposal adds the possibility to run python scripts that connects to the DB and can access RunTags and RunIOVs
  - no changes in existing functionalities is foreseen
  - no dependency on external package required
The changes consists in adding two dictionary files classes.h and classes_def.xml and a python script for testing purposes. Only one existing class has been modified updating the mechanism to report error messages from Oracle (the older one being no more supported).
 -->

#### PR validation:

<!-- 
Validation consists in running the python test script as

python test_db_connect.py [password to connect to EcalLaserCond db account]

It returns a list of runs
-->
